meanings.definition: A painful abscess in the throat caused by inflammation of the tonsils.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with quinsies after examining his throat.
meanings.sent2: Quinsies can make swallowing very difficult and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: When the quinsies appeared, it felt like a tiny monster had taken residence in the throat.
meanings.sent4: Her quinsies were like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode with pain.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing pain of quinsies was a constant reminder of the infection.
